course.title: Course Details
course.bio1: Instructor Ahmed is a coach and consultant in the field of spirituality and mindfulness. He realized early on the importance of helping individuals improve their quality of life and reach deeper levels of inner peace.
course.bio2: He began his journey by exploring the sciences of spirituality and meditation, obtaining specialized diplomas in conscious breathing techniques, mindfulness, and internal energy management. Throughout his career, he has conducted numerous courses and training sessions that have made him an expert in helping people relieve stress and achieve mental and psychological balance between their personal and professional lives.
course.bio3: Ahmed believes that the human spirit needs continuous healing energy and requires a lot of satisfaction and activation of inner self-ability.

termsAndConditions.title: Terms and Conditions
termsAndConditions.metaDescription: Read our terms and conditions for using our services.
termsAndConditions.introductionText: Welcome to our website. These terms and conditions outline the rules and regulations for the use of our services. By accessing this website, we assume you accept these terms and conditions in full.
termsAndConditions.usageText1: You must not use this website in any way that causes, or may cause, damage to the website or impairment of the availability or accessibility of the website.
termsAndConditions.usageText2: You must not use this website for any purposes other than those for which it was designed.
termsAndConditions.privacyText: Your privacy is important to us. Please read our Privacy Policy to understand how we collect, use, and protect your information.
termsAndConditions.returnsText: We offer a 30-day return policy for most items. Please contact us for more information about returns and refunds.
termsAndConditions.liabilityText: We will not be liable for any loss or damage arising from your use of this website or any information provided on it.
termsAndConditions.changesText: We reserve the right to modify these terms and conditions at any time. Any changes will be posted on this page.
termsAndConditions.contactText: If you have any questions about these terms and conditions, please contact us at support@example.com.

privacyPolicy.title: Privacy Policy
privacyPolicy.introductionText: We are committed to protecting your privacy. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, disclose, and safeguard your information when you visit our website or use our services. Please read this policy carefully. If you do not agree with the terms of this policy, please do not access the site.
privacyPolicy.personalInformationText: We may collect personally identifiable information that you voluntarily provide to us when you register, place an order, subscribe to our newsletter, or contact us. This information may include:
privacyPolicy.usageDataText: We may also collect information about how you access and use our website. This data may include your IP address, browser type, operating system, the pages you visit, and other usage information.
privacyPolicy.howWeUseYourInformationText: We use the information we collect in various ways, including to:
usageList: Provide, operate, and maintain our website and services
Improve, personalize, and expand our website and services
Understand and analyze how you use our website and services
Communicate with you, either directly or through one of our partners
privacyPolicy.dataProtectionText: We implement a variety of security measures to maintain the safety of your personal information when you place an order or enter, submit, or access your personal information. All transactions are processed through a secure payment gateway.
privacyPolicy.cookiesText: We use cookies to enhance your experience on our website. Cookies are small files that a site or its service provider transfers to your computer's hard drive through your web browser. These cookies enable the site to recognize your browser and capture certain information.
privacyPolicy.yourRightsText: You have certain data protection rights. We aim to take reasonable steps to allow you to correct, amend, delete, or limit the use of your personal data. If you wish to be informed about what personal data we hold about you and if you want it to be removed from our systems, please contact us.
rightsList: The right to access, update, or delete the information we have on you
privacyPolicy.contactUsText: If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy, please contact us:

faqs.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faqs.subtitle: Find answers to common questions about our services and products.
faqs.contactDescription: Feel free to contact us for more help.
